objective: Multiple remote office users report sporadic internet disconnections. Connection drops for 30-60 seconds every 2-3 hours.

questions: Identify if specific applications are running during outage times
Check for database connections or API calls that might timeout
Review application logs for network-related errors
Verify if any scheduled reports/data syncs coincide with outages
Determine if the issue affects all applications or specific ones
